CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. PC71BM: A specific type of polymer, Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "PC71BM" and "polymers" (with a more specific identification being "PSCs based on these polymers").
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Material Name: PC71BM

This paragraph specifically mentions the material named PC71BM as the one contributing to the photovoltaic performance of the polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. PC71BM: Specific type of polymer used in the PSCs.
3. blend layers: Layers formed by blending different polymers in PSCs.
4. maximum PCE: Maximum Power Conversion Efficiency.
5. 9.70%: Specific value of the maximum Power Conversion Efficiency.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PC71BM: Specific type of polymer used in the PSCs.
2. maximum PCE: Maximum Power Conversion Efficiency.
3. 9.70%: Specific value of the maximum Power Conversion Efficiency (Property Value).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM (type of polymer used in PSCs) |
| maximum Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| 9.70% (specific value of maximum PCE) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. Polymers: Specific types of materials used in the Polymer Solar Cells
3. PC71BM: A particular type of polymer used in the Polymer Solar Cells
4. Blend layers: Layers formed by blending different polymers in Polymer Solar Cells
5. Maximum PCE: Maximum Power Conversion Efficiency. This is a property value that represents the maximum efficiency of the Polymer Solar Cells in converting light energy into electrical energy.

So, the property value entity in the paragraph is "Maximum PCE" with a value of "9.70%".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. Maximum PCE: 9.70% (This is the only entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property, specifically the power conversion efficiency of the Polymer Solar Cells.)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
